instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: need help, problem with BIOS 820-3330
threads.message:
[URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0By4Y--uwCTA6T215X3BFSW1SMWs/view?usp=sharing"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0By4Y--uwCTA6T215X3BFSW1SMWs/view?usp=sharing

here is the original bios, it is korrupt

I copied from the corrupt bios the me region and paste it in a known working good bios

but now i get that:

Only video controller internal, but all test twice
no sensor tests 

need help to create a working bios please.[/URL]

threads.title: need help, problem with BIOS 820-3330
threads.message: I doubt this will be a BIOS issue. What is the history on this board? Was the BIOS messed with?

threads.title: need help, problem with BIOS 820-3330
threads.message:
i got the machine, working so far.
no backlight and blinking folder or sometimes a lock, no keyboard working (pram reset or only hold alt no reaction)

backlight fuse F9700 burned

no short from PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT to ground


in diode mode red on ground i got on PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT .571 

so i replaced the U9701

after that still no backlight but the reading on PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT is already good .538

then I flashed in a known good working bios

after that i had backlight and the keyboard worked (for pram reset)

ASD starts but got a lot og line with errors white letters on black ground in the apple logo screen

so I cut out the Me region of the original bios and insert it on the same place from the good working bios

after that asd starting good

but there are no sensor tests, no extern video controller test

if i open the tests for intern controller there are all tests twice

only start video test is failing

in the system report i can "see" both intern and extern video chip

I think the problem here is something easy but need help to do it , i dont want mess it up.

thank you

threads.title: need help, problem with BIOS 820-3330
threads.message:
Duke you ar THE MAN!

it is working. All sensor test are there and internal and external tests

in the beginning was no backlight but keyboard everything working, after starting ASD the machine switchrd to the extern GPU and backlight was coming.

asd shows gmux switching error, I heated with 100 the GMUX a little and the error was history after that is backlight after restart from the beginning.

So I still replaced the GMUX with a good one (the old was blown up a little on the side)

So now everything is working fine.

Duke can you give the secret what did you do with the bios?

threads.title: need help, problem with BIOS 820-3330
threads.message: would you replace the bios chip?

threads.title: need help, problem with BIOS 820-3330
threads.message: It is your original BIOS that I just removed the password from, so no magic was done. I'd leave the machine as it is now, case closed.
